name: Drinking In Detroit
description:
Solve a series of grisly murders with the help of an undead partner. Drinking in Detroit follows Detective Alex Barker, a troubled police officer with a terrible secret, as he tackles the case of his life. With the help of Beth Harker, a 150-year-old vampire, he'll unravel a dark mystery that threatens to expose the underground world of the undead.

Drinking in Detroit is a submission for the Vampire: The Masquerade Game Jam.
